documents.document: Stressing the fuck out over my college interview in the morning, can't sleep 😭
@frankcarter23 @therattlesnakes killed it as always, Paris has a different vibe than UK but it makes me more excited to see them in Cardiff!
I mostly watch Come Dine With Me for the narrator
When you've been listening to a song for a good 10 years, but the lyrics only just hit you..
*insert copious amounts of swearwords that resembles how much I hate everyone and everything here*
Would love to go for a run tomorrow but my knee is still staying no. I need to find some new ways to clear my head.
I'm so ready to come back home to Bristol
Hopefully will be doing something super drastic to my hair in the next few days 😊😊
Been seeing all sorts of my favourite bands being announced at festivals all over the world, giving me hope for the uk!
"vegan sex is the best sex"... I'm sorry what?!?!?! How can your diet affect your sex life?!?!??
@MollyTurville we'll eat enough on their behalf
@MollyTurville I definitely could go for a cheeky nandos with the lads
@therattlesnakes @BiffyClyro @frankcarter23 haha no she's definitely not :p
Surprising my mum with a trip to Paris to see @BiffyClyro and @frankcarter23 @therattlesnakes 🗼 I love Christmas 🎄
Silently waiting for @donaldglover to do a tour and have a UK leg of said tour 🙄🙄
The mental health system is appalling. Got pressured to go to my gp, I did, I have now been waiting two weeks for a referral. Waste of time.
One of my housemates is French, and honestly her accent makes me swoon.
Nah actually convinced my work is haunted
Snacking on hazelnuts and raisins.. Who am I 😂
@lordofdacats ye no I know, but it's still weird, right? 😂
Weird thought for the day.. Isn't it weird we all swing our arms when we walk
Back and neck in pain from small and ill fitted bras, knee in agony from dislocating in June so sleeping with lots of pillows and heatpacks😔
Counting down the days 'til pay day.. I hate 5 week months with a passion.
I'm checking out the first 5 minutes of @RockyHorrorFOX now! #Trixie #RockyHorror https://t.co/II3g1VKZEN
I forgot how much I hate the radio but then again I'm way too tired to think about what I want to listen to
Your girlfriend isn't a goth just because her "whole wardrobe is black" and she's "arty and spiritual" and wears a choker..
So I saw Barenaked Ladies perform The Big Bang Theory theme song (which they wrote) tonight in work.. I love my job 😍😍
Decided to take up a hobby.. I'm going to learn to play the ukulele
Nooooooooo why do spiders feel the need to take up residence in my room, fuck off outta here!
It's so so sad how much we get shut down for expressing our feelings, whether it be a lover, a parent, a friend, or a boss. Its wrong.
October: tickets for @youmeatsix and @bmthofficial November: tickets for @Slaves and @frankcarter23 @therattlesnakes fuck I love gig season
Still can't get over the fact I cut all my hair off 😂 love it tho
Oh man, codeine is fantastic..
Beyond fucked off with making fuck loads of phone calls trying to sort out tax and chasing up my last employers
Omg yas, so excited for some of my best baes coming to visit me this weekend @buddyluii and Molly and my brothers 😍
I honestly recommended everyone works in a gig venue at least once in their life..
I still don't understand unsolicited dick pics.. Like no.. I give you no reason to send them.. So please stop.
I actually worry about myself 😂😂😂
Getting away for a week due to problems, sofa hopping between Bristol and London, £15 to my name. Fuck.
Sometimes when you've been fighting for so long, the only option you have left is to run.
Why is it so hard to be happy 😔
Sleeping on my shitty mattress after being on a water bed all week doesn't feel right and I don't like it.
Such an amazing week in Newcastle, genuinely upset I'm coming home 😔😔
Don't wanna come home on Friday 😔
I want a water bed, they're so comfy and fun.
@hi5swandive omg that's hilarious 😂 😂 😂
I think I've broken my toe.. But I'm not sure how.. It just hurts like I have.. I don't recall breaking my toe today.. But it hurts..
@leishauh to Newcastle or Italy? Because I just found ones to Italy for £70 😂
Why is it cheaper for me to fly to fucking Italy than it is to Newcastle?!?!
Soooo ready to come home, so ill 😔
That moment when you become really ill on holiday and you're potentially not fit to fly home.. Oh.
Unbelievably happy 😊 😍
@lizzie_bryant @taya__bryant girl you need to try sipsmith gin! Pricey, but definitely worth it 😍
When you said you'd wake up early and do something for your mum, but you didn't, and you know she's gonna be pissed all day now.
It irritates me to see people with poor quality bedding
@leishauh I know 😍😍😍 ps I miss you 💔
WHY HAS IT TAKEN ME SO LONG TO LISTEN TO THE DILLINGER ESCAPE PLAN?!?!
Was suppose to have a friend stay over tonight but she couldn't, the only reason Im gutted is because I went to the effort to clean my room😂
Fuck this shit I'm having a spliff
Why is it so fucking hard. Worst fucking two weeks of my life, I've never needed someone more than I have right now I'm so alone
Red Hot Chili Peppers new album, spliff and a curry on the way 👌👌
I need to be in Barcelona already, these past three weeks have been the worst for a very long time. (apart from Download) I need out.
It would appear I have gained myself an obsessive cockney stalker. Well fuck.
@leishauh that's what I intended to do 😂
@leishauh yesyesyesyesyesyesyes I can't fucking wait
I love my job so much, and couldn't be happier with where I am in life right now. Cardiff was a slow start, but a great change in my life.
I've never appreciated tips as much as I have since working in waitressing, literally means to world to me that people appreciate my service
Been working in the restaurant for two weeks (5 days open to the public) and they're making me a supervisor. So proud and happy for myself 🙌
There's something about getting high as fuck and listening to Pink Floyd that is just so fucking chill
It's so amazing to hear that I've been having the most and best feedback from customers to management in work 😍 I love my job so much
@leishauh yes please ❤
In that crucial moment of needing to quickly decide if I'd rather chill in bed longer or if my appearance is more important for work.
Insidious is scary because of the fucking music
Crying like a baby at The Supervet.. Why am I doing this to myself?!
Cannot wait be back in Barcelona in July, in the mean time someone take me away for a few days 😂
The temptation I have to just up and move to Glasgow is ridiculous..
I've never been this frustrated by someone before.
It's gonna be one of those days. Still haven't slept.
The Morocco episode of Archer makes me want to be back in Morocco.
@ShenissaGovani legit wanted to punch her 😂
The temptation to shave the side of my head again and get it tattooed is ridiculous.. But then I would have to deal with shaved side upkeep.
@ShenissaGovani I thought I was the only one 😂
Hairdressers Friday 🙌🙌
I hate living in a student area. Stop fucking singing it's a Monday night your cretins
@leishauh same that's why I really wanna go 😍
@leishauh that's a good deal 😙
Can't believe I got tickets for The Museum of Curiosity. I get to see @noelfielding11 the day before my birthday 😍😍
So excited to be spending this bank holiday with @leishauh 😍😍 first bank holiday I've had off for a while, pls can we go to grillstock tho
I got woken up by my mum multiple times today, all because she was putting my laundry away and cursing while doing so.. Where's the logic.
The way some people spell really grinds my gears, I can understand the odd one or two spelling mistakes but some people really take the piss
Dude I was not expecting Sia to look like she does..
Nearly 4 years later and you still fuck my head up. Cunt. Download is going to be a weird one this year.
Just went to crazy stalker mode real quick. Bitch I will hurt you.
I'm so glad it's gotten to the point of feeling sick whenever I have a cigarette
The confidence is literally drowning me atm, I feel fucking fantastic 💁💁
This morning got me like.. https://t.co/gCWA37MzeO
I can't remember the last time I had a drink (apart from alcohol) that wasn't water.. My skin is so thankful.
No food in the house so fish and chips it is 😂 again.. Work hard at the gym after this
My life is so fucking weird 😂😂
Someone asked me what I do for work, told them, they said they've never heard of it then simply replies with his number.. Bye felica ✋✋
